profile:
Miracle Marble is a leading Toronto’s fabricator/installer of Marble, Granite and Quartz Countertops that ships from our extensive workshop to anywhere in Ontario. We make kitchen counter tops, vanity tops, tub surrounds, decks, fireplaces, table tops, bar tops, reception desks, and more - virtually any item your project requires.

Our services include an extended knowledgeable technical team, to assist you in your selection process. Miracle Marble is the perfect choice for home owners, builders, designers and interior decorators with a dream to build a counter top, fireplace, Jacuzzi etc.

profile:
Marble Granite Countertops Inc. (MGC Inc.) has the capabilities to meet your aesthetic and design needs. Our assets lie in more than 15 years of experience and skills which our staff brings to the table, resulting in a high quality product delivered on time. We work with designers, architects and home builders to accommodate residential and commercial applications. We also specialize in working with a variety of stones such as Granite, Marble, Limestone, Quartz, Slate and more.
 
Our fabrication facility has all the tools and equipment required to guarantee a product of excellent quality and during fabrication quality control measures are in place to ensure that anything that leaves our facility has been thoroughly reviewed by a full time on-site supervisor. Whether your project is a kitchen counter-top, vanity, tub surrounding, fire place, or custom piece, our goal is to ensure 100% satisfaction on any finished product.

profile:
GTA Countertops has more than 10 years of combined experience in the fabrication and installation of stone products. We purchase a carefully selected variety of granite, marble and quartz in large quantities and stock it locally. This system allows us to offer the luxury of real, natural granite or quartz counter tops at very affordable prices.
 
We pride ourselves in helping you achieve a more beautiful, money saving and practical approach to improving your dream home, we do not outsource any part of your project to another company, from start to finish, it is completed by our company!

profile:
Delsur Marble specializes in custom fabrication and installation of countertops using natural and engineered stones. As a preferred fabricator for many materials including: Marble, Granite, Quartzite, Onyx, Soapstone and Quartz by Caesarstone, Silestone, Hanstone, Quartex, LG Viatera, Vicostone, Zodiaq and much more.

CUSTOM STONE COUNTERTOPS
Make a lasting impression with all natural, custom granite, marble and quartz countertops and wood cabinets from Delsur Marble. Established over 14 years ago, we are a full-service renovation company that is proud to offer stone countertops in Toronto and professional installations to clients in the Greater Toronto Area.

profile:
⭐Our hands-free renovation requires nothing from our clients! All we need are rough measurements for the countertops and we will do the rest. 

⭐We will have our professional team handle all the proper measuring, all the installation, and all the post-cleanup.

⭐Our priority is your satisfaction. That is why we will have the team and the tools available for onsite adjustments to suit your needs.

**We are professional quartz countertop company
**Factory direct, best price and fast delivery and installation

**Custom build quartz :
-kitchen and vanity countertops
-full height or partial backsplash
-Table tops
-fireplace 
-TV accent walls 

**Why choose us:
-Professional fabrication and installation team
-High quality with competitive price
-Bosco Sink for kitchen and bathroom
-Fast delivery/installation (2-7days)
-Free consultation and estimation 
If you have drawing or rough sketch,  send to us. I will give you a quick quote.

⭐Any questions regarding countertops, chat with me on Messenger or call/text me at 647-385-3998. I will response to you ASAP.
